blocks.name: cust
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the class function of uniform structures.
blocks.origin: const class cust { UnifOn }

blocks.name: diff.cust.s
diff.cust.c
diff.cust.w
df-ust
blocks.content: Definition of a uniform structure. Definition 1 of [BourbakiTop1] p. II.1. A uniform structure is used to give a generalization of the idea of Cauchy's sequence. This definition is analogous to ` TopOn ` . Elements of an uniform structure are called entourages. (Contributed by FL, 29-May-2014.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Nov-2017.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-ust(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cust, cmpt(s0, universe, cab(s1, w3a(wss(cv(s1), cpw(cxp(cv(s0), cv(s0)))), wcel(cxp(cv(s0), cv(s0)), cv(s1)), wral(s2, cv(s1), w3a(wral(s3, cpw(cxp(cv(s0), cv(s0))), wi(wss(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wcel(cv(s3), cv(s1)))), wral(s3, cv(s1), wcel(cin(cv(s2), cv(s3)), cv(s1))), w3a(wss(cres(cid, cv(s0)), cv(s2)), wcel(ccnv(cv(s2)), cv(s1)), wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(ccom(cv(s3), cv(s3)), cv(s2))))))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-ust(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ‚ä¢ UnifOn =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ { s1 |(s1 ‚äÜ P((s0 √ó s0))‚àß(s0 √ó s0)‚àà s1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s1,(‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà P((s0 √ó s0)),(s2 ‚äÜ s3 ‚Üí s3 ‚àà s1))‚àß ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà s1,(s2 ‚ãÇ s3)‚àà s1)‚àß((= |` s0)‚äÜ s2 ‚àß `' s2 ‚àà s1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s3 ‚àà s1,(s3 ‚àò s3)‚äÜ s2)))))})
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
}

  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), w3a(wss(c0, cpw(cxp(c1, c1))), wcel(cxp(c1, c1), c0), wral(hs0, c0, w3a(wral(hs1, cpw(cxp(c1, c1)), wi(wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))), wral(hs1, c0, wcel(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0)), w3a(wss(cres(cid, c1), cv(hs0)), wcel(ccnv(cv(hs0)), c0), wrex(hs1, c0, wss(ccom(cv(hs1), cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))))))), wcel(c1, universe))
  elfvex(c0, cust, c1)

blocks.content: A uniform structure is closed under finite intersection. Condition F_II of [BourbakiTop1] p. I.36. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Nov-2017.)

thm ustincl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0)), wcel(cin(c2, c3), c0))

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0)‚Üí(c2 ‚ãÇ c3)‚àà c0)
} = {
  3impa(c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà c0, c3 ‚àà c0, (c2 ‚ãÇ c3)‚àà c0)
  mpan9((c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0), c3 ‚àà c0, (c2 ‚ãÇ c3)‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0,(c2 ‚ãÇ hs0)‚àà c0))
  simp2d((c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0,(c2 ‚ãÇ hs0)‚àà c0), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P((c1 √ó c1)),(c2 ‚äÜ hs0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c0)), ((= |` c1)‚äÜ c2 ‚àß `' c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ‚àò hs0)‚äÜ c2)))
  mpan9(c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà c0, (‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P((c1 √ó c1)),(c2 ‚äÜ hs0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c0))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0,(c2 ‚ãÇ hs0)‚àà c0)‚àß((= |` c1)‚äÜ c2 ‚àß `' c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ‚àò hs0)‚äÜ c2))), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0,(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P((c1 √ó c1)),(hs1 ‚äÜ hs0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c0))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0,(hs1 ‚ãÇ hs0)‚àà c0)‚àß((= |` c1)‚äÜ hs1 ‚àß `' hs1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ‚àò hs0)‚äÜ hs1)))))

  ibi(c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1), (c0 ‚äÜ P((c1 √ó c1))‚àß(c1 √ó c1)‚àà c0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0,(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P((c1 √ó c1)),(hs1 ‚äÜ hs0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c0))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0,(hs1 ‚ãÇ hs0)‚àà c0)‚àß((= |` c1)‚äÜ hs1 ‚àß `' hs1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ‚àò hs0)‚äÜ hs1))))))
  syl(c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1), (c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1)‚Üî(c0 ‚äÜ P((c1 √ó c1))‚àß(c1 √ó c1)‚àà c0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0,(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P((c1 √ó c1)),(hs1 ‚äÜ hs0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c0))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0,(hs1 ‚ãÇ hs0)‚àà c0)‚àß((= |` c1)‚äÜ hs1 ‚àß `' hs1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ‚àò hs0)‚äÜ hs1)))))), c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  elfvex(c0, cust, c1)
  isust(hs1, hs0, c1, universe, c0)
  rspcv(hs1, c2, c0, (‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P((c1 √ó c1)),(hs1 ‚äÜ hs0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c0))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0,(hs1 ‚ãÇ hs0)‚àà c0)‚àß((= |` c1)‚äÜ hs1 ‚àß `' hs1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ‚àò hs0)‚äÜ hs1))), (‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P((c1 √ó c1)),(c2 ‚äÜ hs0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c0))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0,(c2 ‚ãÇ hs0)‚àà c0)‚àß((= |` c1)‚äÜ c2 ‚àß `' c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ‚àò hs0)‚äÜ c2))))

  imbi1d(hs1 = c2, hs1 ‚äÜ hs0, hs0 ‚àà c0, c2 ‚äÜ hs0)
  sseq1(hs1, c2, hs0)
  ralbidv(hs0, c0, hs1 = c2, (hs1 ‚ãÇ hs0)‚àà c0, (c2 ‚ãÇ hs0)‚àà c0)
  eleq1d((hs1 ‚ãÇ hs0), c0, (c2 ‚ãÇ hs0), hs1 = c2)
  ineq1(hs1, c2, hs0)
  3anbi123d(hs1 = c2, (= |` c1)‚äÜ hs1, `' hs1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ‚àò hs0)‚äÜ hs1), (= |` c1)‚äÜ c2, `' c2 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ‚àò hs0)‚äÜ c2))
  sseq2(hs1, c2, (= |` c1))
  eleq1d(`' hs1, c0, `' c2, hs1 = c2)
  cnveq(hs1, c2)
  rexbidv(hs0, c0, hs1 = c2, (hs0 ‚àò hs0)‚äÜ hs1, (hs0 ‚àò hs0)‚äÜ c2)

  ineq2(hs0, c3, c2)

  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.w((‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P((c1 √ó c1)),(c2 ‚äÜ hs0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c0))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0,(c2 ‚ãÇ hs0)‚àà c0)‚àß((= |` c1)‚äÜ c2 ‚àß `' c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ‚àò hs0)‚äÜ c2))))
  diff.hs0.w(hs1 = c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w((c2 ‚ãÇ c3)‚àà c0)
}

blocks.name: ustdiag
blocks.content: The diagonal set is included in any entourage, i.e. any point is ` V ` -close to itself. Condition U_I of [BourbakiTop1] p. II.1. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 2-Dec-2017.)

blocks.name: ustinvel

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)

} = {
  simp3d((c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c0), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0,(s0 ‚àò s0)‚äÜ c2), (= |` c1)‚äÜ c2, `' c2 ‚àà c0)

  simp3d(c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P((c1 √ó c1)),(hs0 ‚äÜ s0 ‚Üí s0 ‚àà c0))‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ‚ãÇ s0)‚àà c0)‚àß((= |` c1)‚äÜ hs0 ‚àß `' hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0,(s0 ‚àò s0)‚äÜ hs0)))), c0 ‚äÜ P((c1 √ó c1)), (c1 √ó c1)‚àà c0)
  ibi(c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1), (c0 ‚äÜ P((c1 √ó c1))‚àß(c1 √ó c1)‚àà c0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0,(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P((c1 √ó c1)),(hs0 ‚äÜ s0 ‚Üí s0 ‚àà c0))‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ‚ãÇ s0)‚àà c0)‚àß((= |` c1)‚äÜ hs0 ‚àß `' hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0,(s0 ‚àò s0)‚äÜ hs0))))))

  rspcv(hs0, c2, c0, (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P((c1 √ó c1)),(hs0 ‚äÜ s0 ‚Üí s0 ‚àà c0))‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ‚ãÇ s0)‚àà c0)‚àß((= |` c1)‚äÜ hs0 ‚àß `' hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0,(s0 ‚àò s0)‚äÜ hs0))), (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P((c1 √ó c1)),(c2 ‚äÜ s0 ‚Üí s0 ‚àà c0))‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c2 ‚ãÇ s0)‚àà c0)‚àß((= |` c1)‚äÜ c2 ‚àß `' c2 ‚àà c0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0,(s0 ‚àò s0)‚äÜ c2))))

  ralbidv(s0, P((c1 √ó c1)), hs0 = c2, (hs0 ‚äÜ s0 ‚Üí s0 ‚àà c0), (c2 ‚äÜ s0 ‚Üí s0 ‚àà c0))

blocks.name: ustrel
blocks.content: The elements of uniform structures, called entourages, are relations. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Nov-2017.)

blocks.name: ustfilxp
blocks.content: A uniform structure on a nonempty base is a filter. Remark 3 of [BourbakiTop1] p. II.2. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Nov-2017.) (Proof shortened by Peter Mazsa, 2-Oct-2022.)

  mpbir2and(wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c1, cfv(cust, c0))), wcel(c1, cfv(cfbas, cxp(c0, c0))), wss(c1, cpw(cxp(c0, c0))), w3a(wne(c1, emptycls), wnel(emptycls, c1), wral(hs1, c1, wral(hs0, c1, wne(cin(c1, cpw(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))), emptycls)))))

  3jca(wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c1, cfv(cust, c0))), wne(c1, emptycls), wnel(emptycls, c1), wral(hs1, c1, wral(hs0, c1, wne(cin(c1, cpw(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))), emptycls))))

blocks.name: ustssco
blocks.content: In an uniform structure, any entourage ` V ` is a subset of its composition with itself. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 5-Jan-2018.)

blocks.name: ustref
blocks.content: Any element of the base set is "near" itself, i.e. entourages are reflexive. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Nov-2017.)

blocks.name: ust0
blocks.content: The unique uniform structure of the empty set is the empty set. Remark 3 of [BourbakiTop1] p. II.2. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Nov-2017.)

This proposition actually does not require any axiom of the definition of uniform structures. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Nov-2017.)

  cnvxp(csn(c2), cima(c0, csn(c2)))
  eqsstr3i(ccnv(cxp(csn(c2), cima(c0, csn(c2)))), ccnv(c0), ccnv(cres(c0, csn(c2))))

thm elrnust(class c0, class c1) {

  mpancom(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wrex(hs0, cdm(cust), wcel(c0, cfv(cust, cv(hs0)))), wcel(c1, cdm(cust)))
  elfvdm(c0, cust, c1)
  rspcev(hs0, c1, cdm(cust), wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cust, cv(hs0))))
  eleq2d(c0, cfv(cust, cv(hs0)), cfv(cust, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c1, cust)
  mp2b(wb(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(cust))), wrex(hs0, cdm(cust), wcel(c0, cfv(cust, cv(hs0))))), wfn(cust, universe), wfun(cust))

  syl6sseq(cuni(c0), cxp(c1, c1), cuni(cpw(cxp(c1, c1))), wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)))
  unissd(c0, cpw(cxp(c1, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)))
  simp1d(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wss(c0, cpw(cxp(c1, c1))), wcel(cxp(c1, c1), c0), wral(hs0, c0, w3a(wral(hs1, cpw(cxp(c1, c1)), wi(wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))), wral(hs1, c0, wcel(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0)), w3a(wss(cres(cid, c1), cv(hs0)), wcel(ccnv(cv(hs0)), c0), wrex(hs1, c0, wss(ccom(cv(hs1), cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))))))
  ibi(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), w3a(wss(c0, cpw(cxp(c1, c1))), wcel(cxp(c1, c1), c0), wral(hs0, c0, w3a(wral(hs1, cpw(cxp(c1, c1)), wi(wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))), wral(hs1, c0, wcel(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0)), w3a(wss(cres(cid, c1), cv(hs0)), wcel(ccnv(cv(hs0)), c0), wrex(hs1, c0, wss(ccom(cv(hs1), cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))))))))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), w3a(wss(c0, cpw(cxp(c1, c1))), wcel(cxp(c1, c1), c0), wral(hs0, c0, w3a(wral(hs1, cpw(cxp(c1, c1)), wi(wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))), wral(hs1, c0, wcel(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0)), w3a(wss(cres(cid, c1), cv(hs0)), wcel(ccnv(cv(hs0)), c0), wrex(hs1, c0, wss(ccom(cv(hs1), cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))))))), wcel(c1, universe))
  elfvex(c0, cust, c1)
  isust(hs0, hs1, c1, universe, c0)
  unipw(cxp(c1, c1))

  ibi(c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1), (c0 ‚äÜ P((c1 √ó c1))‚àß(c1 √ó c1)‚àà c0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0,(‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà P((c1 √ó c1)),(hs0 ‚äÜ hs1 ‚Üí hs1 ‚àà c0))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ‚ãÇ hs1)‚àà c0)‚àß((= |` c1)‚äÜ hs0 ‚àß `' hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c0,(hs1 ‚àò hs1)‚äÜ hs0))))))
  syl(c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1), (c0 ‚àà(UnifOn ` c1)‚Üî(c0 ‚äÜ P((c1 √ó c1))‚àß(c1 √ó c1)‚àà c0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0,(‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà P((c1 √ó c1)),(hs0 ‚äÜ hs1 ‚Üí hs1 ‚àà c0))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ‚ãÇ hs1)‚àà c0)‚àß((= |` c1)‚äÜ hs0 ‚àß `' hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c0,(hs1 ‚àò hs1)‚äÜ hs0)))))), c1 ‚àà ùïå)

blocks.name: ustuni
blocks.content: The set union of a uniform structure is the Cartesian product of its base. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 5-Dec-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm ustuni(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wceq(cuni(c0), cxp(c1, c1)))
} = {
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wceq(cuni(c0), cxp(c1, c1)), wcel(cxp(c1, c1), c0), wss(c0, cpw(cxp(c1, c1))))
  ustbasel(c0, c1)
  sylibr(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wss(c0, cpw(cxp(c1, c1))), wral(hs0, c0, wss(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, c1))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c0, wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, c1)))
  ustssxp(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  pwssb(hs0, c0, cxp(c1, c1))
  biimpa(wcel(cxp(c1, c1), c0), wss(c0, cpw(cxp(c1, c1))), wceq(cuni(c0), cxp(c1, c1)))
  elpwuni(cxp(c1, c1), c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(c1, c1))
}

blocks.name: ustbas
blocks.content: Recover the base of an uniform structure ` U ` . ` U. ran UnifOn ` is to ` UnifOn ` what ` Top ` is to ` TopOn ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Nov-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm ustbas(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(cust))), wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)))
  -| wceq(c1, cdm(cuni(c0)))
} = {
  impbii(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(cust))), wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)))
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(cust))), wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wrex(hs0, cdm(cust), wcel(c0, cfv(cust, cv(hs0)))))
  mp2b(wb(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(cust))), wrex(hs0, cdm(cust), wcel(c0, cfv(cust, cv(hs0))))), wfn(cust, universe), wfun(cust))
  ustfn()
  fnfun(cust, universe)
  elunirn(hs0, cust, c0)
  rexlimivw(hs0, cdm(cust), wcel(c0, cfv(cust, cv(hs0))), wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)))
  ibi(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, cv(hs0))), wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)))
  eleq2d(c0, cfv(cust, cv(hs0)), cfv(cust, c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cust, cv(hs0))))
  fveq2d(cust, cv(hs0), c1, wcel(c0, cfv(cust, cv(hs0))))
  syl6eqr(cv(hs0), c1, cdm(cuni(c0)), wcel(c0, cfv(cust, cv(hs0))))
  ustbas2(c0, cv(hs0))
  elrnust(c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cust)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)))
}

blocks.name: trust
blocks.content: The trace of a uniform structure ` U ` on a subset ` A ` is a uniform structure on ` A ` . Definition 3 of [BourbakiTop1] p. II.9. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 2-Dec-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm trust(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wcel(co(c0, crest, cxp(c2, c2)), cfv(cust, c2)))
} = {
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wcel(co(c0, crest, cxp(c2, c2)), cfv(cust, c2)), w3a(wss(co(c0, crest, cxp(c2, c2)), cpw(cxp(c2, c2))), wcel(cxp(c2, c2), co(c0, crest, cxp(c2, c2))), wral(hs0, co(c0, crest, cxp(c2, c2)), w3a(wral(hs1, cpw(cxp(c2, c2)), wi(wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(c0, crest, cxp(c2, c2))))), wral(hs1, co(c0, crest, cxp(c2, c2)), wcel(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), co(c0, crest, cxp(c2, c2)))), w3a(wss(cres(cid, c2), cv(hs0)), wcel(ccnv(cv(hs0)), co(c0, crest, cxp(c2, c2))), wrex(hs1, co(c0, crest, cxp(c2, c2)), wss(ccom(cv(hs1), cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))))))))
  3jca(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wss(co(c0, crest, cxp(c2, c2)), cpw(cxp(c2, c2))), wcel(cxp(c2, c2), co(c0, crest, cxp(c2, c2))), wral(hs0, co(c0, crest, cxp(c2, c2)), w3a(wral(hs1, cpw(cxp(c2, c2)), wi(wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(c0, crest, cxp(c2, c2))))), wral(hs1, co(c0, crest, cxp(c2, c2)), wcel(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), co(c0, crest, cxp(c2, c2)))), w3a(wss(cres(cid, c2), cv(hs0)), wcel(ccnv(cv(hs0)), co(c0, crest, cxp(c2, c2))), wrex(hs1, co(c0, crest, cxp(c2, c2)), wss(ccom(cv(hs1), cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))))))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wss(co(c0, crest, cxp(c2, c2)), cpw(cxp(c2, c2))))
  restsspw(c0, cxp(c2, c2))
  eqeltrrd(cxp(c2, c2), co(c0, crest, cxp(c2, c2)), cin(cxp(c1, c1), cxp(c2, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wss(c2, c1)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wceq(cin(cxp(c1, c1), cxp(c2, c2)), cxp(c2, c2)))
  syl5eq(cin(cxp(c1, c1), cxp(c2, c2)), cxp(c2, c2), cxp(cin(c1, c2), cin(c1, c2)), wss(c2, c1))
  inxp(c1, c1, c2, c2)
  sqxpeqd(cin(c1, c2), c2, wss(c2, c1))
  biimpi(wss(c2, c1), wceq(cin(c1, c2), c2))
  sseqin2(c2, c1)
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wcel(cin(cxp(c1, c1), cxp(c2, c2)), co(c0, crest, cxp(c2, c2))), wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wcel(cxp(c2, c2), universe), wcel(cxp(c1, c1), c0))
